snippet.title: The Last Winter Knight - Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
I'm making a narrative game/visual novel where you're a haunted suit of armour.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2768420/The_Last_Winter_Knight/

Itch: https://endysis.itch.io/winterknight

Website: https://endysis.net/winterknight
